mapper.select: select o.onboard_date, f.brandname, f.truck_code from onboard o join foodtruck f on (o.truck_code = f.truck_code) where o.email = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into onboard(truck_code, email, onboard_date) values(#{truck_code}, #{email}, #{onboard_date})
